backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access-controlled user profiles, quiz storage, and question retrieval with support for articles and blob-based images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing publishing and diagnostics features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files covering styles, components, hooks, quiz logic, PDF import, and configuration.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment configuration showing translation API settings and how to supply backend canister IDs for builds and runtime.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining cyber-bunker OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes plus safe-area support.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template that forces dark mode and loads runtime environment variables from env.json before bootstrapping React.
frontend/public/env.json: Placeholder runtime configuration file containing a placeholder backend canister ID with instructions to be replaced during publish.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Publishing guide detailing how to deploy via the Caffeine editor and how to verify runtime configuration using in-app diagnostics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, health checks, and rendering UI states like profile setup and diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusPanel: Empty placeholder file for an admin status panel component.
frontend/src/components/AdminTokenReauth: Empty placeholder file for an admin token reauthentication dialog component.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderBrand.t: Renders the app header brand with an icon and static title/subtitle text.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Displays build metadata including version, timestamp, and deployment ID in the footer.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Diagnostics panel for checking health, runtime env, connection info, and publish readiness with various expandable sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ManualBackendCan: UI to manually enter, validate, save, or clear a backend canister ID override and trigger retries.
frontend/src/components/PendingUpdateBan: Banner that notifies users about available updates and offers a guarded refresh action.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple form for collecting and saving the user's name during initial setup.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Creates and configures backend actors with IDL loading, agent setup, and canister ID resolution.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Implements a translation helper using a configurable API endpoint with MyMemory as fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Provides export and restore of full backend state via actor calls with JSON serialization and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Exports all quizzes with their questions and block names by iterating through quiz IDs using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerateArticle.ts: Generates an article from question text, then normalizes and validates its content using a React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client configuration with a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingUpdate.ts: Detects if a new build is available by comparing stored and current build IDs and provides a mark-as-seen helper.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: Implements press-and-hold detection with pointer and keyboard events, returning state and event handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks that call actor methods to fetch or mutate user profiles, quizzes, counts, and questions with error capture and conditional enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Implements a translation hook with caching, deduped requests, and error handling for translating question text.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Offers a function to copy all questions from one quiz to another and invalidates related queries, with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSingleRefreshAttem: Creates a guarded refresh mechanism ensuring only one refresh-to-latest-build attempt runs per session.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with first‑pass randomization, spaced repeats, and mastery tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI component for exporting all quiz data to JSON and restoring from a selected backup file with confirmation flow.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Helpers for computing 100‑question blocks, ranges, labels, and extracting block‑specific questions.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing quiz drafts in localStorage with versioned serialization.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Utilities for JPEG validation, file-to-bytes conversion, preview URLs, and ExternalBlob creation.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview component.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into questions.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: Lets users choose how many questions to practice before starting a quiz, with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Shows a summary of selected block and question count before quiz start, with validation and navigation options.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Component for attaching, uploading, previewing, and removing JPEG images for quiz questions.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Full quiz editing interface handling question management, recovery, validation, image uploads, and draft saving.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Provides optional diagnostic logging for quiz flow transitions and actions using a localStorage flag.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Runs the quiz flow including block selection, question sequencing, adaptive scheduling, answering, and translation support.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz score and provides actions to replay, review wrong answers, or return to editing.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizScoreBar.tsx: Fixed bottom bar showing running tally of correct and answered questions.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Creates randomized subsets of indices using Fisher‑Yates shuffle with size clamping.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines interfaces for tracking per‑question performance and overall session state.
frontend/src/quiz/StudyArticleView.tsx: View for reading an article tied to a question, with back navigation and scrollable content.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Collapsible panel listing quizzes and question counts for debugging quiz data issues.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re‑exports Question and QuizId types from backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions, checking content, answer counts, answer text, and correct answer index.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: React component showing missed questions with back navigation and Escape-key support.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines WrongAnswerEntry structure for wrong‑answer review data.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Type definitions for environment variables and window runtime metadata.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend canister connection info, determining host, network, and resolution metadata.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Retrieves build/version metadata prioritizing runtime env, and logs formatted build info.
Resolves the backend canister ID using manual overrides, runtime env.json, or Vite env vars, with detailed error handling and placeholder detection.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related errors with metadata to aid troubleshooting, including a full diagnostic report generator.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Generates a detailed plain‑text publish checklist including build info, canister resolution details, and step‑by‑step publishing instructions.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates whether the app is ready for live use based on canister resolution and backend health checks, returning a structured readiness status.
frontend/src/utils/manualBackendCanister: Handles manual backend canister ID overrides via URL or localStorage with validation utilities and active override resolution.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Provides utilities to export quiz data as JSON, generate timestamped filenames, and trigger browser downloads.
Implements a hard-refresh workflow that clears app storage, unregisters service workers, wipes caches, marks the current build as seen, and reloads with cache-busting while capturing diagnostics on failure.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvReload.ts: Fetches /env.json with cache-busting, updates runtime environment globals, handles missing/placeholder values, and returns a structured reload result.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects window.__ENV__ and load status markers to produce a detailed environment status with messages and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Generates a multi-section plain‑text report containing build data, deployment URL, canister resolution info, runtime env status, and health‑check results.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes StateSnapshot objects to JSON-safe form, handling ExternalBlob URLs and validating structure.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Detects stopped‑canister errors (IC0508), extracts canister IDs, and provides user messages and recovery steps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state metadata, features, and deployment notes for the current build process.
unknown.txt: Contains instructions for generating study articles and managing stored article content with conditional creation.
